numbrix
Class NumbrixEngine

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      numbrix.NumbrixEngine

public class NumbrixEngine
extends java.util.Observable

A class to represent the state of a Numbrix game. Loads Numbrix files and checks for validity and completeness.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam Eary

Method Detail

loadGame

public void loadGame(java.lang.String fileName)
              throws java.text.ParseException,
                     InvalidGameStateException,
                     java.io.FileNotFoundException
Loads a game from a text file and verifies that it is valid.

Parameters:
fileName - The filename of the text file to be loaded.
Throws:
java.text.ParseException - if there is an error while parsing.
InvalidGameStateException - if the file parses but the game is invalid.
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the filename cannot be found.

isComplete

public boolean isComplete()
Tests the board for completeness.

Returns:
true if the puzzle has no empty spaces, false otherwise.

loadStatus

public boolean loadStatus()
Checks to see if a game has been loaded.

Returns:
true if a board has been loaded. false otherwise.

the number of rows.

addNumber

public void addNumber(int number,
                      int row,
                      int col)
               throws InvalidGameStateException
Allows numbers to be added to the game board.

Parameters:
number - the number to be added to the board.
row - the row of the number to be added.
col - the column of the number to be added.
Throws:
InvalidGameStateException - if there is a problem with the number being added.

hasBeenModified

public boolean hasBeenModified()
Checks to see if the original board has been modified.

Returns:
true if the board has not been changed, false otherwise.

resetBoard

public void resetBoard()
Resets a board to its original form.

newBlankGame

public void newBlankGame(int rows,
                         int cols)
                  throws InvalidGameStateException
Starts a totally blank game with size inputs only.

Parameters:
rows - The number of rows in the new board.
cols - The number of columns in the new board.
Throws:
InvalidGameStateException - if the size is too small.
